name: P-gp inhibition can increase exposure of P-gp substrates

scenario.notes: Reference P-gp inhibition interaction involving a narrow therapeutic index substrate.

actions: Use caution when combining P-gp inhibitors with narrow-TI substrates.
Monitor for toxicity symptoms related to increased exposure.
Recognize that transporter effects can be context-dependent.

rationale: Even modest exposure increases may be clinically important for narrow-TI drugs.

explanation_template: {B_name} inhibits P-gp and {A_name} is a P-gp substrate with a narrow therapeutic index. This can increase systemic exposure and toxicity risk.

references.citation: Transporter inhibition + narrow therapeutic index increases risk even with modest changes.
